definition: Buddha's teachings/aura (around the head of Buddha)

sentences.english: Buddha illuminates, safe and happy. Paradise on death.
sentences.chinese: 佛光普照，事事顺利，吉祥如意，幸福平安。

sentences.english: Buddha illuminates, everything goes well , has good luck, happy and safe.
sentences.chinese: 佛光普照，事事顺利，吉祥如意，幸福平安。

sentences.english: Now for the main hall of the Buddha Temple was built in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 现在佛光寺的正殿为唐代所建。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a Buddha's light jade and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种佛光玉及其制造方法。

sentences.english: The head of the figure is often surrounded by rings of coloured light.
sentences.chinese: “佛光”的头被彩色的光圈环绕。

sentences.english: Buddha Temple was built in Northern Wei Dynasty, and later destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 佛光寺始建于北魏，后来被毁。

sentences.english: Mount Emei Buddha is the most magnificent spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 佛光是峨眉山最壮美的奇观。
